seo.title_override: Miami Mattress Disposal Guide 2026: Easy & Eco-Friendly
seo.meta_desc_override: Dispose of your mattress in Miami without a fine! Learn local rules, check city guidelines for curbside pickup, and find hassle-free options for 2026. Stay informed.

hero_hook: Don't let Miami's rainy weather and unclear curbside rules make mattress disposal a soggy, confusing chore.
neighborhoods: Brickell, Wynwood, Little Havana, Coconut Grove, Downtown Miami, Edgewater, Midtown, Design District, Allapattah, Overtown, Little Haiti, Upper East Side, Flagami, West Flagler, Shenandoah

weather_profile.rejection_risk_copy: WARNING: Miami averages 100+ rainy days per year. If your mattress gets wet before pickup, the city WILL NOT take it (too heavy, mold risk). Our haulers pick up from inside your home — rain or shine.

drop_off_locations.name: The City of Miami, Department of Solid Waste, Mini Dump Facility
drop_off_locations.hours: MONDAY - FRIDAY 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM SATURDAY: 8:00 AM - 12 Noon CLOSED: Sunday, Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. & Christmas Day
drop_off_locations.notes: ONE (1) PROOF OF CITY OF MIAMI RESIDENCY: Florida Driver's license or Florida ID, utility statements for the last 3 months (ex. electricity, cell phone, water or trash compactor bill), a rental agreement, a tax bill or other documents that prove City of Miami residency. A MAXIMUM OF ONE (1) TRIP PER DAY ALLOWED (Each trip is no more than a pickup truck load). WILL NOT ACCEPT THE FOLLOWING: VEHICLES WITH COMMERCIAL MARKINGS, DUMP-TYPE OR PANEL TYPE TRUCKS, COMMERCIAL TRUCKS OR VANS OR MATERIALS FROM COMMERCIAL CONTRACTORS.

competitor_comparison.value_prop: No franchise fees. Just local haulers.
